* _id = device id
* n - device name
* tag [] - device tags
* ep [] - device end points
* res [] - device resources
  * href - resource id
  * rt [] - resource types
  * if [] - recource interfaces
  * n - resource name
  * tag [] - resource tags
  
  
service resources:
/oic/con
/oic/d
/oic/mnt
/oic/p
/oic/sec/*
/oic/res
